title: The Block List and Emotes.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Hello I dont know about others but over the years i have blocked quite a number of people for various reasons and over the years i feel as if i am at the limit it is hard to tell if i have successfully blocked someone because i cannot tell whether or not my block-list is updated as the entire system is unorganized and a huge mess.

The link is a small gif i made of my block-list. There a couple of features i would like added. Maybe sort out the list alphabetically display the number of people blocked or notify us if we have maxed out our block list. The entire system i understand rarely gets much attention in patches but i believe that it needs an update to at least sort out the outdated display format.

As for emotes i dislike them, i was against the idea of them but they are here so there is not much i can do about them but mute them in game. 
I would like for the option to permanently mute them in the settings on client menu or /mute emotes for both teams in game its tedious at the start and can delay getting to lane or position in jungle.

That's all thanks.
